text: Starry is a lemon lime soda made by PepsiCo. This soda would make its debut on March 23rd, 2022 from the open house market in Boston, New York. PepsiCo started selling it in 2023. At this time, the company also stopped selling Sierra Mist. Starry broke many sales records. It primarily competes with Sprite, but also with other brands such as 7 Up. Category:PepsiCo brands Category:Soft drinks
title: Starry (drink)
